short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add candidates & Review candidate submissions in ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whitecarrot.io helps employers in building exceptional candidate experiences by using technologies like Video Interviewing, Auto-Scheduling, Shortlisting Quiz, Recruitment guides, Code Assessments and much more.

This plugin helps whitecarrot.io platform users to review candidate responses for:
1. video interviews
2. shortlisting quiz & code challenges
right next to the candidate profile on their ATS (Applicant Tracking System).
